description: Automation for Next.js build pipelines and WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility auditing

evals.name: Build Pipeline Success
evals.prompt: Run the full build pipeline (lint, test, build) on my Next.js project and tell me if everything passes.
evals.expected_output: A structured report showing pass/fail status for linting, testing, and build stages with execution times
assertions: The output clearly indicates whether lint passed or failed
The output clearly indicates whether tests passed or failed
The output clearly indicates whether build passed or failed
The report includes execution time for each stage
The overall status (all passed or failed) is explicitly stated

evals.name: Build Pipeline Error Handling
evals.prompt: Run the build pipeline but simulate a failing linting step. Show me what errors are reported and how to fix them.
evals.expected_output: A report that captures linting errors and provides suggestions for fixing them
assertions: The error from the failing linting step is captured and displayed
The report suggests at least one way to fix the error
The report indicates which specific files have linting violations
The overall pipeline status shows FAIL

evals.name: Accessibility Audit - WCAG AA Compliance
evals.prompt: Run a full accessibility audit on my website to check for WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.
evals.expected_output: A comprehensive accessibility report categorizing issues by severity and providing remediation steps
assertions: The report categorizes issues by severity (critical, serious, moderate, minor)
The report indicates WCAG 2.1 AA compliance status (pass/fail)
The report includes multiple accessibility categories (color contrast, alt text, keyboard nav, ARIA, etc.)
Specific violations include recommended fixes or remediation steps
The report lists the pages that were audited

evals.name: Accessibility Audit - Specific Issues
evals.prompt: Check my website for accessibility issues focusing on color contrast, missing alt text, and keyboard navigation.
evals.expected_output: A focused accessibility report highlighting issues in the requested categories with specific recommendations
assertions: Color contrast issues are identified and scored against WCAG AA standards
Missing alt text on images is detected and listed
Keyboard navigation problems are identified
For each issue, a specific fix is recommended
The report is actionable (clear steps to remediate)

evals.name: Pre-Deployment Checklist
evals.prompt: I'm about to deploy to production. Run the pre-deployment checklist: build pipeline success, accessibility audit, and give me a go/no-go decision.
evals.expected_output: A pre-deployment summary with build status, accessibility status, and a clear deployment recommendation
assertions: Build pipeline status is clearly reported
Accessibility audit results are summarized
Critical accessibility issues (if any) are flagged
A clear recommendation (GO/NO-GO) is provided based on the checks
The report is suitable for deployment decision-making
